featured.text: Kids are tuned into their parents’ eating preferences and are far more likely to try foods if they see their mother or father eating them.
Sometimes a tune intrudes on our thoughts and then plays, and replays, in a never-ending loop.
It is a tune memorized in a personal way.
Researchers are not sure why some songs are more likely to get stuck in our heads than others, but everyone has their own tunes.

definition.en_def: A melody or a musical composition; to adjust or modify something for better performance.
definition.example: She hummed a cheerful tune while walking in the park.
